file.content:
name: Update Flake Input
description: Update a single flake input, create PR, and enable auto-merge

inputs:
  input:
    description: Flake input name
    required: true
  owner:
    description: GitHub repository owner
    required: true
  repo:
    description: GitHub repository name
    required: true
  token:
    description: GitHub token for PR operations
    required: true
  skip-delay:
    description: Skip random delay
    default: "false"
  minimum-release-age-days:
    description: Minimum age in days for the release commit
    default: "0"

runs:
  using: composite
  steps:
    - name: Random delay
      if: inputs.skip-delay != 'true'
      shell: bash
      run: |
        DELAY=$((RANDOM % 60))
        echo "Sleeping ${DELAY}s to avoid rate limits"
        sleep "$DELAY"

    - name: Get current revision
      id: current
      shell: bash
      run: |
        NODE=$(jq -r '.nodes.root.inputs["${{ inputs.input }}"]' flake.lock)
        REV=$(jq -r ".nodes[\"${NODE}\"].locked.rev" flake.lock)
        echo "node=${NODE}" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        echo "rev=${REV}" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"

    - name: Update flake input
      shell: bash
      run: nix flake update "${{ inputs.input }}"

    - name: Get updated revision
      id: updated
      shell: bash
      run: |
        NODE="${{ steps.current.outputs.node }}"
        REV=$(jq -r ".nodes[\"${NODE}\"].locked.rev" flake.lock)
        echo "rev=${REV}" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"

    - name: Check release age
      if: inputs.minimum-release-age-days != '0' && steps.current.outputs.rev != steps.updated.outputs.rev
      id: age-check
      shell: bash
      run: |
        COMMIT_DATE=$(gh api "repos/${{ inputs.owner }}/${{ inputs.repo }}/commits/${{ steps.updated.outputs.rev }}" --jq '.commit.committer.date')
        COMMIT_TS=$(date -d "$COMMIT_DATE" +%s)
        THRESHOLD_TS=$(date -d "${{ inputs.minimum-release-age-days }} days ago" +%s)

        if [ "$COMMIT_TS" -gt "$THRESHOLD_TS" ]; then
          echo "Commit ${{ steps.updated.outputs.rev }} is less than ${{ inputs.minimum-release-age-days }} days old, skipping"
          git checkout -- flake.lock
          echo "skip=true" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        else
          echo "skip=false" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        fi
      env:
        GH_TOKEN: ${{ inputs.token }}

    - name: Check for changes
      id: diff
      if: steps.age-check.outputs.skip != 'true'
      shell: bash
      run: |
        if git diff --quiet flake.lock; then
          echo "No changes for ${{ inputs.input }}"
          echo "changed=false" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        else
          echo "changed=true" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        fi

    - name: Get llm-agents package versions
      if: inputs.input == 'llm-agents' && steps.diff.outputs.changed == 'true'
      id: versions
      shell: bash
      run: |
        OLD_REV="${{ steps.current.outputs.rev }}"
        NEW_REV="${{ steps.updated.outputs.rev }}"
        PACKAGES="claude-code ccusage codex opencode vibe-kanban"

        TABLE="| Package | Old | New |"
        TABLE="${TABLE}
        |---|---|---|"

        for pkg in $PACKAGES; do
          OLD_VER=$(nix eval --raw "github:numtide/llm-agents.nix/${OLD_REV}#packages.x86_64-linux.${pkg}.version" 2>/dev/null || echo "N/A")
          NEW_VER=$(nix eval --raw "github:numtide/llm-agents.nix/${NEW_REV}#packages.x86_64-linux.${pkg}.version" 2>/dev/null || echo "N/A")
          TABLE="${TABLE}
        | \`${pkg}\` | ${OLD_VER} | ${NEW_VER} |"
        done

        {
          echo "table<<VERSIONS_EOF"
          echo "$TABLE"
          echo "VERSIONS_EOF"
        } >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"

    - name: Create or update PR
      if: steps.diff.outputs.changed == 'true'
      shell: bash
      run: |
        INPUT="${{ inputs.input }}"
        BRANCH="update-flake-${INPUT}"
        OLD_REV="${{ steps.current.outputs.rev }}"
        NEW_REV="${{ steps.updated.outputs.rev }}"
        SHORT_OLD="${OLD_REV:0:7}"
        SHORT_NEW="${NEW_REV:0:7}"
        COMPARE_URL="https://github.com/${{ inputs.owner }}/${{ inputs.repo }}/compare/${OLD_REV}...${NEW_REV}"

        # Commit and push
        git checkout -B "$BRANCH"
        git add flake.lock
        git commit -m "flake.lock: update ${INPUT}"
        git push -f origin "$BRANCH"

        # Build PR body
        BODY="Update \`${INPUT}\` input.

        **Diff**: [\`${SHORT_OLD}...${SHORT_NEW}\`](${COMPARE_URL})"

        VERSION_TABLE="${{ steps.versions.outputs.table }}"
        if [ -n "$VERSION_TABLE" ]; then
          BODY="${BODY}

        ## Package Versions

        ${VERSION_TABLE}"
        fi

        # Create or update PR
        EXISTING_PR=$(gh pr list --head "$BRANCH" --state open --json number --jq '.[0].number' 2>/dev/null || true)

        if [ -n "$EXISTING_PR" ] && [ "$EXISTING_PR" != "null" ]; then
          echo "Updating existing PR #${EXISTING_PR}"
          gh pr edit "$EXISTING_PR" --body "$BODY"
        else
          echo "Creating new PR"
          gh pr create \
            --title "flake.lock: update ${INPUT}" \
            --body "$BODY" \
            --head "$BRANCH"
        fi

        # Enable auto-merge
        PR_NUMBER=$(gh pr list --head "$BRANCH" --state open --json number --jq '.[0].number')
        if [ -n "$PR_NUMBER" ] && [ "$PR_NUMBER" != "null" ]; then
          gh pr merge "$PR_NUMBER" --auto --squash
        fi
      env:
        GH_TOKEN: ${{ inputs.token }}

    10→      include-inputs:
    11→        description: Comma-separated list of inputs to include (if set, only these)
    12→        type: string
    13→        default: ""

    42→

    51→      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

file.content:
name: Update Flake Inputs (Reusable)

on:
  workflow_call:
    inputs:
      exclude-inputs:
        description: Comma-separated list of inputs to exclude
        type: string
        default: ""
      include-inputs:
        description: Comma-separated list of inputs to include (if set, only these)
        type: string
        default: ""
      skip-delay:
        description: Skip random delay between updates
        type: boolean
        default: false
      minimum-release-age-days:
        description: Minimum age in days for the release commit
        type: number
        default: 0
    secrets:
      FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_ID:
        required: true
      FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_PRIVATE_KEY:
        required: true

jobs:
  discover:
    runs-on: ubuntu-24.04-arm
    outputs:
      matrix: ${{ steps.discover.outputs.matrix }}
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: ./.github/actions/setup-nix
      - id: discover
        uses: ./.github/actions/discover-flake-inputs
        with:
          exclude-inputs: ${{ inputs.exclude-inputs }}
          include-inputs: ${{ inputs.include-inputs }}
          skip-delay: ${{ inputs.skip-delay }}

  update:
    needs: discover
    if: ${{ fromJSON(needs.discover.outputs.matrix).include[0] != null }}

The user will need to create the cache at cachix.org first, but I'll mention that after implementing the changes. name: "Update Flake Inputs (Stable)"

on:
  schedule:
    - cron: "0 6 * * *"
  workflow_dispatch:
    inputs:
      minimum-release-age-days:
        description: "Minimum release age in days before updating"
        required: false
        type: number
        default: 3
      skip-delay:
        description: "Skip the minimum release age check for all inputs"
        required: false
        type: boolean
        default: false

jobs:
  update:
    uses: ./.github/workflows/_update-flake-reusable.yaml
    with:
      exclude-inputs: "llm-agents"
      minimum-release-age-days: ${{ github.event.inputs.minimum-release-age-days && fromJSON(github.event.inputs.minimum-release-age-days) || 3 }}
      skip-delay: ${{ github.event.inputs.skip-delay == 'true' }}
    secrets:
      FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_ID: ${{ secrets.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_ID }}
      FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_PRIVATE_KEY: ${{ secrets.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_PRIVATE_KEY }}
      CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN }}

name: "Update Flake Inputs (Frequent)"

on:
  schedule:
    - cron: "0 */3 * * *"
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  update:
    uses: ./.github/workflows/_update-flake-reusable.yaml
    with:
      include-inputs: "llm-agents"
      skip-delay: true
      minimum-release-age-days: 0
    secrets:
      FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_ID: ${{ secrets.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_ID }}
      FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_PRIVATE_KEY: ${{ secrets.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_PRIVATE_KEY }}
      CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN }}

name: Update Flake Input
description: Update a single flake input, create PR, and enable auto-merge

inputs:
  input:
    description: Flake input name
    required: true
  owner:
    description: GitHub repository owner
    required: true
  repo:
    description: GitHub repository name
    required: true
  token:
    description: GitHub token for PR operations
    required: true
  skip-delay:
    description: Skip random delay
    default: "false"
  minimum-release-age-days:
    description: Minimum age in days for the release commit
    default: "0"

runs:
  using: composite
  steps:
    - name: Random delay
      if: inputs.skip-delay != 'true'
      shell: bash
      run: |
        DELAY=$((RANDOM % 60))
        echo "Sleeping ${DELAY}s to avoid rate limits"
        sleep "$DELAY"

    - name: Get current revision
      id: current
      shell: bash
      run: |
        NODE=$(jq -r '.nodes.root.inputs["${{ inputs.input }}"]' flake.lock)
        REV=$(jq -r ".nodes[\"${NODE}\"].locked.rev" flake.lock)
        echo "node=${NODE}" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        echo "rev=${REV}" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"

    - name: Update flake input
      shell: bash
      run: nix flake update "${{ inputs.input }}"

    - name: Get updated revision
      id: updated
      shell: bash
      run: |
        NODE="${{ steps.current.outputs.node }}"
        REV=$(jq -r ".nodes[\"${NODE}\"].locked.rev" flake.lock)
        echo "rev=${REV}" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"

    - name: Check release age
      if: inputs.minimum-release-age-days != '0' && steps.current.outputs.rev != steps.updated.outputs.rev
      id: age-check
      shell: bash
      run: |
        COMMIT_DATE=$(gh api "repos/${{ inputs.owner }}/${{ inputs.repo }}/commits/${{ steps.updated.outputs.rev }}" --jq '.commit.committer.date')
        COMMIT_TS=$(date -d "$COMMIT_DATE" +%s)
        THRESHOLD_TS=$(date -d "${{ inputs.minimum-release-age-days }} days ago" +%s)

        if [ "$COMMIT_TS" -gt "$THRESHOLD_TS" ]; then
          echo "Commit ${{ steps.updated.outputs.rev }} is less than ${{ inputs.minimum-release-age-days }} days old, skipping"
          git checkout -- flake.lock
          echo "skip=true" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        else
          echo "skip=false" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        fi
      env:
        GH_TOKEN: ${{ inputs.token }}

    - name: Check for changes
      id: diff
      if: steps.age-check.outputs.skip != 'true'
      shell: bash
      run: |
        if git diff --quiet flake.lock; then
          echo "No changes for ${{ inputs.input }}"
          echo "changed=false" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        else
          echo "changed=true" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        fi

    - name: Get llm-agents package versions
      if: inputs.input == 'llm-agents' && steps.diff.outputs.changed == 'true'
      id: versions
      shell: bash
      run: |
        OLD_REV="${{ steps.current.outputs.rev }}"
        NEW_REV="${{ steps.updated.outputs.rev }}"
        PACKAGES="claude-code ccusage codex opencode vibe-kanban amp gemini-cli goose-cli"

        TABLE="| Package | Old | New |"
        TABLE="${TABLE}
        |---|---|---|"

        PKG_DIFF=""

        for pkg in $PACKAGES; do
          OLD_VER=$(nix eval --raw "github:numtide/llm-agents.nix/${OLD_REV}#packages.x86_64-linux.${pkg}.version" 2>/dev/null || echo "N/A")
          NEW_VER=$(nix eval --raw "github:numtide/llm-agents.nix/${NEW_REV}#packages.x86_64-linux.${pkg}.version" 2>/dev/null || echo "N/A")

          if [ "$OLD_VER" != "$NEW_VER" ] && [ "$NEW_VER" != "N/A" ]; then
            MARKER=" :arrow_up:"
            if [ -n "$PKG_DIFF" ]; then
              PKG_DIFF="${PKG_DIFF}, ${pkg}=${NEW_VER}"
            else
              PKG_DIFF="${pkg}=${NEW_VER}"
            fi
          else
            MARKER=""
          fi

          TABLE="${TABLE}
        | \`${pkg}\` | ${OLD_VER} | ${NEW_VER}${MARKER} |"
        done

        {
          echo "table<<VERSIONS_EOF"
          echo "$TABLE"
          echo "VERSIONS_EOF"
        } >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"

        echo "pkg_diff=${PKG_DIFF}" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"

    - name: Create or update PR
      if: steps.diff.outputs.changed == 'true'
      shell: bash
      run: |
        INPUT="${{ inputs.input }}"
        BRANCH="update-flake-${INPUT}"
        OLD_REV="${{ steps.current.outputs.rev }}"
        NEW_REV="${{ steps.updated.outputs.rev }}"
        SHORT_OLD="${OLD_REV:0:7}"
        SHORT_NEW="${NEW_REV:0:7}"
        COMPARE_URL="https://github.com/${{ inputs.owner }}/${{ inputs.repo }}/compare/${OLD_REV}...${NEW_REV}"

        # Build PR title with version diff for llm-agents
        PKG_DIFF="${{ steps.versions.outputs.pkg_diff }}"
        if [ -n "$PKG_DIFF" ]; then
          PR_TITLE="flake.lock: update ${INPUT} (${PKG_DIFF})"
        else
          PR_TITLE="flake.lock: update ${INPUT}"
        fi

        # Commit and push
        git checkout -B "$BRANCH"
        git add flake.lock
        git commit -m "$PR_TITLE"
        git push -f origin "$BRANCH"

        # Build PR body
        BODY="Update \`${INPUT}\` input.

        **Diff**: [\`${SHORT_OLD}...${SHORT_NEW}\`](${COMPARE_URL})"

        VERSION_TABLE="${{ steps.versions.outputs.table }}"
        if [ -n "$VERSION_TABLE" ]; then
          BODY="${BODY}

        ## Package Versions

        ${VERSION_TABLE}"
        fi

        # Create or update PR
        EXISTING_PR=$(gh pr list --head "$BRANCH" --state open --json number --jq '.[0].number' 2>/dev/null || true)

        if [ -n "$EXISTING_PR" ] && [ "$EXISTING_PR" != "null" ]; then
          echo "Updating existing PR #${EXISTING_PR}"
          gh pr edit "$EXISTING_PR" --title "$PR_TITLE" --body "$BODY"
        else
          echo "Creating new PR"
          gh pr create \
            --title "$PR_TITLE" \
            --body "$BODY" \
            --head "$BRANCH" \
            --label "dependencies,automated"
        fi

        # Enable auto-merge
        PR_NUMBER=$(gh pr list --head "$BRANCH" --state open --json number --jq '.[0].number')
        if [ -n "$PR_NUMBER" ] && [ "$PR_NUMBER" != "null" ]; then
          gh pr merge "$PR_NUMBER" --auto --squash
        fi
      env:
        GH_TOKEN: ${{ inputs.token }}

description: Update a single flake input, create PR, and enable auto-merge

inputs:

    description: Flake input name

  using: composite
  steps:
    - name: Random delay
      if: inputs.skip-delay != 'true'
      shell: bash
      run: |
        DELAY=$((RANDOM % 60))
        echo "Sleeping ${DELAY}s to avoid rate limits"
        sleep "$DELAY"

    - name: Get current revision
      id: current
      shell: bash
      run: |
        NODE=$(jq -r '.nodes.root.inputs["${{ inputs.input }}"]' flake.lock)
        REV=$(jq -r ".nodes[\"${NODE}\"].locked.rev" flake.lock)
        echo "node=${NODE}" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        echo "rev=${REV}" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"

    - name: Update flake input
      shell: bash
      run: nix flake update "${{ inputs.input }}"

    - name: Get updated revision
      id: updated
      shell: bash
      run: |
        NODE="${{ steps.current.outputs.node }}"
        REV=$(jq -r ".nodes[\"${NODE}\"].locked.rev" flake.lock)
        echo "rev=${REV}" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"

    - name: Check release age
      if: inputs.minimum-release-age-days != '0' && steps.current.outputs.rev != steps.updated.outputs.rev
      id: age-check
      shell: bash
      run: |
        COMMIT_DATE=$(gh api "repos/${{ inputs.owner }}/${{ inputs.repo }}/commits/${{ steps.updated.outputs.rev }}" --jq '.commit.committer.date')
        COMMIT_TS=$(date -d "$COMMIT_DATE" +%s)
        THRESHOLD_TS=$(date -d "${{ inputs.minimum-release-age-days }} days ago" +%s)

        if [ "$COMMIT_TS" -gt "$THRESHOLD_TS" ]; then
          echo "Commit ${{ steps.updated.outputs.rev }} is less than ${{ inputs.minimum-release-age-days }} days old, skipping"
          git checkout -- flake.lock
          echo "skip=true" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        else
          echo "skip=false" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        fi
      env:
        GH_TOKEN: ${{ inputs.token }}

    - name: Check for changes
      id: diff
      if: steps.age-check.outputs.skip != 'true'
      shell: bash
      run: |
        if git diff --quiet flake.lock; then
          echo "No changes for ${{ inputs.input }}"
          echo "changed=false" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        else
          echo "changed=true" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        fi

    - name: Get llm-agents package versions
      if: inputs.input == 'llm-agents' && steps.diff.outputs.changed == 'true'
      id: versions
      shell: bash
      run: |
        OLD_REV="${{ steps.current.outputs.rev }}"
        NEW_REV="${{ steps.updated.outputs.rev }}"
        PACKAGES="claude-code ccusage codex opencode vibe-kanban amp gemini-cli goose-cli"

        TABLE="| Package | Old | New |"
        TABLE="${TABLE}
        |---|---|---|"

        PKG_DIFF=""

        for pkg in $PACKAGES; do
          OLD_VER=$(nix eval --raw "github:numtide/llm-agents.nix/${OLD_REV}#packages.x86_64-linux.${pkg}.version" 2>/dev/null || echo "N/A")
          NEW_VER=$(nix eval --raw "github:numtide/llm-agents.nix/${NEW_REV}#packages.x86_64-linux.${pkg}.version" 2>/dev/null || echo "N/A")

          if [ "$OLD_VER" != "$NEW_VER" ] && [ "$NEW_VER" != "N/A" ]; then
            MARKER=" :arrow_up:"
            if [ -n "$PKG_DIFF" ]; then
              PKG_DIFF="${PKG_DIFF}, ${pkg}=${NEW_VER}"
            else
              PKG_DIFF="${pkg}=${NEW_VER}"
            fi
          else
            MARKER=""
          fi

          TABLE="${TABLE}
        | \`${pkg}\` | ${OLD_VER} | ${NEW_VER}${MARKER} |"
        done

        {
          echo "table<<VERSIONS_EOF"
          echo "$TABLE"
          echo "VERSIONS_EOF"
        } >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"

        echo "pkg_diff=${PKG_DIFF}" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"

    - name: Create or update PR
      if: steps.diff.outputs.changed == 'true'
      shell: bash
      run: |
        INPUT="${{ inputs.input }}"
        BRANCH="update-flake-${INPUT}"
        OLD_REV="${{ steps.current.outputs.rev }}"
        NEW_REV="${{ steps.updated.outputs.rev }}"
        SHORT_OLD="${OLD_REV:0:7}"
        SHORT_NEW="${NEW_REV:0:7}"
        COMPARE_URL="https://github.com/${{ inputs.owner }}/${{ inputs.repo }}/compare/${OLD_REV}...${NEW_REV}"

        # Build PR title with version diff for llm-agents
        PKG_DIFF="${{ steps.versions.outputs.pkg_diff }}"
        if [ -n "$PKG_DIFF" ]; then
          PR_TITLE="flake.lock: update ${INPUT} (${PKG_DIFF})"
        else
          PR_TITLE="flake.lock: update ${INPUT}"
        fi

        # Commit and push
        git checkout -B "$BRANCH"
        git add flake.lock
        git commit -m "$PR_TITLE"
        git push -f origin "$BRANCH"

        # Build PR body
        BODY="Update \`${INPUT}\` input.

        **Diff**: [\`${SHORT_OLD}...${SHORT_NEW}\`](${COMPARE_URL})"

        VERSION_TABLE="${{ steps.versions.outputs.table }}"
        if [ -n "$VERSION_TABLE" ]; then
          BODY="${BODY}

        ## Package Versions

        ${VERSION_TABLE}"
        fi

        # Create or update PR
        EXISTING_PR=$(gh pr list --head "$BRANCH" --state open --json number --jq '.[0].number' 2>/dev/null || true)

        if [ -n "$EXISTING_PR" ] && [ "$EXISTING_PR" != "null" ]; then
          echo "Updating existing PR #${EXISTING_PR}"
          gh pr edit "$EXISTING_PR" --title "$PR_TITLE" --body "$BODY"
        else
          echo "Creating new PR"
          gh pr create \
            --title "$PR_TITLE" \
            --body "$BODY" \
            --head "$BRANCH" \
            --label "dependencies,automated"
        fi

        # Enable auto-merge
        PR_NUMBER=$(gh pr list --head "$BRANCH" --state open --json number --jq '.[0].number')
        if [ -n "$PR_NUMBER" ] && [ "$PR_NUMBER" != "null" ]; then
          gh pr merge "$PR_NUMBER" --auto --squash
        fi
      env:
        GH_TOKEN: ${{ inputs.token }}

name: Update Flake Input
description: Update a single flake input, create PR, and enable auto-merge

inputs:
  input:
    description: Flake input name
    required: true
  owner:
    description: GitHub repository owner
    required: true
  repo:
    description: GitHub repository name
    required: true
  token:
    description: GitHub token for PR operations
    required: true
  skip-delay:
    description: Skip random delay
    default: "false"
  minimum-release-age-days:
    description: Minimum age in days for the release commit
    default: "0"

runs:
  using: composite
  steps:
    - name: Random delay
      if: inputs.skip-delay != 'true'
      shell: bash
      run: |
        DELAY=$((RANDOM % 60))
        echo "Sleeping ${DELAY}s to avoid rate limits"
        sleep "$DELAY"

    - name: Get current revision
      id: current
      shell: bash
      run: |
        NODE=$(jq -r '.nodes.root.inputs["${{ inputs.input }}"]' flake.lock)
        REV=$(jq -r ".nodes[\"${NODE}\"].locked.rev" flake.lock)
        echo "node=${NODE}" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        echo "rev=${REV}" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"

    - name: Update flake input
      shell: bash
      run: nix flake update "${{ inputs.input }}"

    - name: Get updated revision
      id: updated
      shell: bash
      run: |
        NODE="${{ steps.current.outputs.node }}"
        REV=$(jq -r ".nodes[\"${NODE}\"].locked.rev" flake.lock)
        echo "rev=${REV}" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"

    - name: Check release age
      if: inputs.minimum-release-age-days != '0' && steps.current.outputs.rev != steps.updated.outputs.rev
      id: age-check
      shell: bash
      run: |
        COMMIT_DATE=$(gh api "repos/${{ inputs.owner }}/${{ inputs.repo }}/commits/${{ steps.updated.outputs.rev }}" --jq '.commit.committer.date')
        COMMIT_TS=$(date -d "$COMMIT_DATE" +%s)
        THRESHOLD_TS=$(date -d "${{ inputs.minimum-release-age-days }} days ago" +%s)

        if [ "$COMMIT_TS" -gt "$THRESHOLD_TS" ]; then
          echo "Commit ${{ steps.updated.outputs.rev }} is less than ${{ inputs.minimum-release-age-days }} days old, skipping"
          git checkout -- flake.lock
          echo "skip=true" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        else
          echo "skip=false" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        fi
      env:
        GH_TOKEN: ${{ inputs.token }}

    - name: Check for changes
      id: diff
      if: steps.age-check.outputs.skip != 'true'
      shell: bash
      run: |
        if git diff --quiet flake.lock; then
          echo "No changes for ${{ inputs.input }}"
          echo "changed=false" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        else
          echo "changed=true" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        fi

    - name: Get llm-agents package versions
      if: inputs.input == 'llm-agents' && steps.diff.outputs.changed == 'true'
      id: versions
      shell: bash
      run: |
        OLD_REV="${{ steps.current.outputs.rev }}"
        NEW_REV="${{ steps.updated.outputs.rev }}"
        PACKAGES="claude-code ccusage codex opencode vibe-kanban"

        TABLE="| Package | Old | New |"
        TABLE="${TABLE}
        |---|---|---|"

        for pkg in $PACKAGES; do
          OLD_VER=$(nix eval --raw "github:numtide/llm-agents.nix/${OLD_REV}#packages.x86_64-linux.${pkg}.version" 2>/dev/null || echo "N/A")
          NEW_VER=$(nix eval --raw "github:numtide/llm-agents.nix/${NEW_REV}#packages.x86_64-linux.${pkg}.version" 2>/dev/null || echo "N/A")
          TABLE="${TABLE}
        | \`${pkg}\` | ${OLD_VER} | ${NEW_VER} |"
        done

        {
          echo "table<<VERSIONS_EOF"
          echo "$TABLE"
          echo "VERSIONS_EOF"
        } >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"

    - name: Create or update PR
      if: steps.diff.outputs.changed == 'true'
      shell: bash
      run: |
        INPUT="${{ inputs.input }}"
        BRANCH="update-flake-${INPUT}"
        OLD_REV="${{ steps.current.outputs.rev }}"
        NEW_REV="${{ steps.updated.outputs.rev }}"
        SHORT_OLD="${OLD_REV:0:7}"
        SHORT_NEW="${NEW_REV:0:7}"
        COMPARE_URL="https://github.com/${{ inputs.owner }}/${{ inputs.repo }}/compare/${OLD_REV}...${NEW_REV}"

        # Commit and push
        git checkout -B "$BRANCH"
        git add flake.lock
        git commit -m "flake.lock: update ${INPUT}"
        git push -f origin "$BRANCH"

        # Build PR body
        BODY="Update \`${INPUT}\` input.

        **Diff**: [\`${SHORT_OLD}...${SHORT_NEW}\`](${COMPARE_URL})"

        VERSION_TABLE="${{ steps.versions.outputs.table }}"
        if [ -n "$VERSION_TABLE" ]; then
          BODY="${BODY}

        ## Package Versions

        ${VERSION_TABLE}"
        fi

        # Create or update PR
        EXISTING_PR=$(gh pr list --head "$BRANCH" --state open --json number --jq '.[0].number' 2>/dev/null || true)

        if [ -n "$EXISTING_PR" ] && [ "$EXISTING_PR" != "null" ]; then
          echo "Updating existing PR #${EXISTING_PR}"
          gh pr edit "$EXISTING_PR" --body "$BODY"
        else
          echo "Creating new PR"
          gh pr create \
            --title "flake.lock: update ${INPUT}" \
            --body "$BODY" \
            --head "$BRANCH"
        fi

        # Enable auto-merge
        PR_NUMBER=$(gh pr list --head "$BRANCH" --state open --json number --jq '.[0].number')
        if [ -n "$PR_NUMBER" ] && [ "$PR_NUMBER" != "null" ]; then
          gh pr merge "$PR_NUMBER" --auto --squash
        fi
      env:
        GH_TOKEN: ${{ inputs.token }}

file.content:
name: "CI: Nix build"

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  pull_request:
  workflow_dispatch:

concurrency:
  group: ${{ github.workflow }}-${{ github.ref }}
  cancel-in-progress: true

jobs:
  changes:
    runs-on: ubuntu-24.04-arm
    outputs:
      nix: ${{ steps.filter.outputs.nix }}
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: dorny/paths-filter@v3
        id: filter
        with:
          filters: |
            nix:
              - 'flake.nix'
              - 'flake.lock'
              - 'nix/**'
              - '.github/workflows/nix-build.yaml'
              - '.github/actions/setup-nix/**'

  build:
    needs: changes
    if: needs.changes.outputs.nix == 'true' || github.event_name == 'workflow_dispatch'
    runs-on: ubuntu-24.04-arm
    timeout-minutes: 30
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: ./.github/actions/setup-nix
      - name: Build NixOS configuration
        run: |
          nix build .#nixosConfigurations.nixos.config.system.build.toplevel \
            --print-build-logs \
            --show-trace

name: "CI: Nix build"

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  pull_request:
  workflow_dispatch:

concurrency:
  group: ${{ github.workflow }}-${{ github.ref }}
  cancel-in-progress: true

jobs:
  changes:
    runs-on: ubuntu-24.04-arm
    outputs:
      nix: ${{ steps.filter.outputs.nix }}
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: dorny/paths-filter@v3
        id: filter
        with:
          filters: |
            nix:
              - 'flake.nix'
              - 'flake.lock'
              - 'nix/**'
              - '.github/workflows/nix-build.yaml'
              - '.github/actions/setup-nix/**'

  build:
    needs: changes
    if: needs.changes.outputs.nix == 'true' || github.event_name == 'workflow_dispatch'
    runs-on: ubuntu-24.04-arm
    timeout-minutes: 30
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: ./.github/actions/setup-nix
      - name: Build NixOS configuration
        run: |
          nix build .#nixosConfigurations.nixos.config.system.build.toplevel \
            --print-build-logs \
            --show-trace

content.text:
全ファイル更新完了。変更点まとめ:

### `setup-nix/action.yaml`
- `github_access_token` 追加（GitHub API レート制限回避）
- `yutakobayashidev` Cachix キャッシュへの書き込み対応（`cachix-auth-token` が渡された場合のみ有効）

### `_update-flake-reusable.yaml`
- `CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN` シークレットを追加・setup-nix に伝播

### `update-flake.yaml`
- `workflow_dispatch` に `minimum-release-age-days` と `skip-delay` パラメータ追加（手動実行時に柔軟に制御可能）

### `update-flake-frequent.yaml`
- `CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN` を伝播

### `update-flake-input/action.yaml`
- バージョンチェック対象に `amp`, `gemini-cli`, `goose-cli` 追加
- PR タイトルにバージョン差分表示（例: `flake.lock: update llm-agents (claude-code=1.1.0)`）
- 既存 PR のタイトルも更新（`gh pr edit --title`）
- PR ラベル `dependencies,automated` 付与
- バージョンテーブルに変更があった行に `:arrow_up:` マーカー

### `nix-build.yaml`
- ビルド結果を Cachix にプッシュ

---

### Cachix セットアップ手順

使う前に以下が必要です:

1. https://app.cachix.org で `yutakobayashidev` キャッシュを作成（別名にする場合は `setup-nix/action.yaml` の `name` を変更）
2. Auth token を生成
3. GitHub リポジトリの Settings > Secrets に `CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN` を追加
4. `dependencies` と `automated` ラベルを GitHub リポジトリに作成

input.description: ryoppippi の setup-git-bot (action.yml) を取得

content.content:
name: 'Setup Git Bot'
description: 'Configure git with bot identity for automated commits'

inputs:
  app-id:
    description: 'GitHub App ID'
    required: true
  private-key:
    description: 'GitHub App private key'
    required: true

outputs:
  token:
    description: 'GitHub App token for subsequent steps'
    value: ${{ steps.app-token.outputs.token }}

runs:
  using: 'composite'
  steps:
    - name: Generate GitHub App Token
      id: app-token
      uses: actions/create-github-app-token@bf559f85448f9380bcfa2899dbdc01eb5b37be3a # v3.0.0-beta.2
      with:
        app-id: ${{ inputs.app-id }}
        private-key: ${{ inputs.private-key }}

    - name: Configure git bot identity
      shell: bash
      env:
        GH_TOKEN: ${{ steps.app-token.outputs.token }}
        APP_SLUG: ${{ steps.app-token.outputs.app-slug }}
      run: |
        bot_id=$(gh api "users/${APP_SLUG}[bot]" --jq '.id')
        git config user.name "${APP_SLUG}[bot]"
        git config user.email "${bot_id}+${APP_SLUG}[bot]@users.noreply.github.com"

content.text:
差分は以下の通りです:

| 項目 | ryoppippi | 自分 |
|------|-----------|------|
| ファイル名 | `action.yml` | `action.yaml` |
| inputs | `app-id`, `private-key` の2つ | `app-id`, `app-private-key`, `app-slug` の3つ |
| app-slug の取得方法 | `create-github-app-token` の **output** (`${{ steps.app-token.outputs.app-slug }}`) から自動取得 | **input** として手動で渡す（`${{ vars.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_SLUG }}` が必要） |
| action バージョン | `v3.0.0-beta.2`（SHA ピン） | `v2` |

**本質的な違いは1つ**: ryoppippi は `actions/create-github-app-token` の v3 beta を使っていて、このバージョンは **`app-slug` を output として返す**ので、input で渡す必要がない。自分の方は v2 なので `app-slug` を別途 `vars.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_SLUG` で管理している。

v3 に上げれば `app-slug` input と `FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_SLUG` vars が不要になります。上げますか？

message.content: v3にして

file.content:
name: Setup Git Bot
description: Generate GitHub App token and configure git identity

inputs:
  app-id:
    description: GitHub App ID
    required: true
  app-private-key:
    description: GitHub App private key
    required: true
  app-slug:
    description: GitHub App slug (URL末尾部分)
    required: true

outputs:
  token:
    description: GitHub App installation token
    value: ${{ steps.token.outputs.token }}

runs:
  using: composite
  steps:
    - id: token
      uses: actions/create-github-app-token@v2
      with:
        app-id: ${{ inputs.app-id }}
        private-key: ${{ inputs.app-private-key }}

    - id: bot-identity
      shell: bash
      run: |
        BOT_USER_ID=$(gh api "/users/${{ inputs.app-slug }}%5Bbot%5D" --jq '.id')
        echo "name=${{ inputs.app-slug }}[bot]" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        echo "email=${BOT_USER_ID}+${{ inputs.app-slug }}[bot]@users.noreply.github.com" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
      env:
        GH_TOKEN: ${{ steps.token.outputs.token }}

    - shell: bash
      run: |
        git config user.name "${{ steps.bot-identity.outputs.name }}"
        git config user.email "${{ steps.bot-identity.outputs.email }}"

    required: true
  app-slug:
    description: GitHub App slug (URL末尾部分)

outputs:
  token:
    description: GitHub App installation token
    value: ${{ steps.token.outputs.token }}

toolUseResult.originalFile:
name: Update Flake Inputs (Reusable)

on:
  workflow_call:
    inputs:
      exclude-inputs:
        description: Comma-separated list of inputs to exclude
        type: string
        default: ""
      include-inputs:
        description: Comma-separated list of inputs to include (if set, only these)
        type: string
        default: ""
      skip-delay:
        description: Skip random delay between updates
        type: boolean
        default: false
      minimum-release-age-days:
        description: Minimum age in days for the release commit
        type: number
        default: 0
    secrets:
      FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_ID:
        required: true
      FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_PRIVATE_KEY:
        required: true
      CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN:
        required: false

jobs:
  discover:
    runs-on: ubuntu-24.04-arm
    outputs:
      matrix: ${{ steps.discover.outputs.matrix }}
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: ./.github/actions/setup-nix
      - id: discover
        uses: ./.github/actions/discover-flake-inputs
        with:
          exclude-inputs: ${{ inputs.exclude-inputs }}
          include-inputs: ${{ inputs.include-inputs }}
          skip-delay: ${{ inputs.skip-delay }}

  update:
    needs: discover
    if: ${{ fromJSON(needs.discover.outputs.matrix).include[0] != null }}
    runs-on: ubuntu-24.04-arm
    strategy:
      fail-fast: false
      matrix: ${{ fromJSON(needs.discover.outputs.matrix) }}
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - id: setup-bot
        uses: ./.github/actions/setup-git-bot
        with:
          app-id: ${{ secrets.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_ID }}
          app-private-key: ${{ secrets.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_PRIVATE_KEY }}
          app-slug: ${{ vars.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_SLUG }}

      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          token: ${{ steps.setup-bot.outputs.token }}

      - uses: ./.github/actions/setup-nix
        with:
          cachix-auth-token: ${{ secrets.CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN }}

      - uses: ./.github/actions/update-flake-input
        with:
          input: ${{ matrix.input }}
          owner: ${{ matrix.owner }}
          repo: ${{ matrix.repo }}
          token: ${{ steps.setup-bot.outputs.token }}
          skip-delay: ${{ matrix.skip_delay }}
          minimum-release-age-days: ${{ inputs.minimum-release-age-days }}

  summary:
    needs: [discover, update]
    if: always()
    runs-on: ubuntu-24.04-arm
    steps:
      - run: |
          echo "## Update Summary" >> "$GITHUB_STEP_SUMMARY"
          echo "- Discover: ${{ needs.discover.result }}" >> "$GITHUB_STEP_SUMMARY"
          echo "- Update: ${{ needs.update.result }}" >> "$GITHUB_STEP_SUMMARY"

file.content:
name: "Auto-rebase update PRs"

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  workflow_dispatch:

concurrency:
  group: auto-rebase
  cancel-in-progress: false

jobs:
  rebase-prs:
    runs-on: ubuntu-24.04-arm
    if: github.event_name == 'workflow_dispatch' || github.event.head_commit.committer.name == 'GitHub'
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - id: setup-bot
        uses: ./.github/actions/setup-git-bot
        with:
          app-id: ${{ secrets.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_ID }}
          app-private-key: ${{ secrets.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_PRIVATE_KEY }}
          app-slug: ${{ vars.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_SLUG }}

      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          token: ${{ steps.setup-bot.outputs.token }}
          fetch-depth: 0

      - name: Rebase open flake update PRs
        shell: bash
        run: |
          BRANCHES=$(gh pr list --state open --json headRefName --jq '.[].headRefName | select(startswith("update-flake-"))')

          if [ -z "$BRANCHES" ]; then
            echo "No update-flake PRs found"
            exit 0
          fi

          for BRANCH in $BRANCHES; do
            echo "--- Processing $BRANCH ---"
            git fetch origin "$BRANCH"

            BEHIND=$(git rev-list --count "origin/$BRANCH..origin/main")
            if [ "$BEHIND" -eq 0 ]; then
              echo "$BRANCH is up to date"
              continue
            fi

            echo "$BRANCH is $BEHIND commits behind main, rebasing..."
            git checkout "$BRANCH"

            if git rebase origin/main; then
              git push --force-with-lease origin "$BRANCH"
              echo "$BRANCH rebased successfully"
            else
              echo "$BRANCH rebase failed, aborting"
              git rebase --abort
            fi

            git checkout main
          done
        env:
          GH_TOKEN: ${{ steps.setup-bot.outputs.token }}

name: "Auto-rebase update PRs"

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  workflow_dispatch:

concurrency:
  group: auto-rebase
  cancel-in-progress: false

jobs:
  rebase-prs:
    runs-on: ubuntu-24.04-arm
    if: github.event_name == 'workflow_dispatch' || github.event.head_commit.committer.name == 'GitHub'
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - id: setup-bot
        uses: ./.github/actions/setup-git-bot
        with:
          app-id: ${{ secrets.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_ID }}
          app-private-key: ${{ secrets.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_PRIVATE_KEY }}
          app-slug: ${{ vars.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_SLUG }}

      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          token: ${{ steps.setup-bot.outputs.token }}
          fetch-depth: 0

      - name: Rebase open flake update PRs
        shell: bash
        run: |
          BRANCHES=$(gh pr list --state open --json headRefName --jq '.[].headRefName | select(startswith("update-flake-"))')

          if [ -z "$BRANCHES" ]; then
            echo "No update-flake PRs found"
            exit 0
          fi

          for BRANCH in $BRANCHES; do
            echo "--- Processing $BRANCH ---"
            git fetch origin "$BRANCH"

            BEHIND=$(git rev-list --count "origin/$BRANCH..origin/main")
            if [ "$BEHIND" -eq 0 ]; then
              echo "$BRANCH is up to date"
              continue
            fi

            echo "$BRANCH is $BEHIND commits behind main, rebasing..."
            git checkout "$BRANCH"

            if git rebase origin/main; then
              git push --force-with-lease origin "$BRANCH"
              echo "$BRANCH rebased successfully"
            else
              echo "$BRANCH rebase failed, aborting"
              git rebase --abort
            fi

            git checkout main
          done
        env:

- `setup-git-bot`: v2 → v3、`app-slug` input 削除（v3 の output から自動取得）
- `_update-flake-reusable.yaml`: `app-slug` 行削除

→ `FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_SLUG` の vars はもう不要です。

input.description: ryoppippi の auto-merge-pr action の構成確認

content.content: action.yml

input.description: ryoppippi の auto-merge-pr action を取得

content.content:
name: 'Auto-merge PR'
description: 'Enable auto-merge for a pull request with squash strategy'

inputs:
  pr-number:
    description: 'Pull request number to auto-merge'
    required: true
  merge-method:
    description: 'Merge method to use (squash, merge, rebase)'
    required: false
    default: 'squash'
  github-token:
    description: 'GitHub token for enabling auto-merge'
    required: true

outputs:
  enabled:
    description: 'Whether auto-merge was successfully enabled'
    value: ${{ steps.auto-merge.outputs.enabled }}

runs:
  using: 'composite'
  steps:
    - name: Enable auto-merge
      id: auto-merge
      shell: bash
      env:
        GH_TOKEN: ${{ inputs.github-token }}
        PR_NUMBER: ${{ inputs.pr-number }}
        MERGE_METHOD: ${{ inputs.merge-method }}
      run: |
        set -euo pipefail

        echo "Enabling auto-merge for PR #$PR_NUMBER with $MERGE_METHOD strategy"

        if gh pr merge "$PR_NUMBER" --auto --"$MERGE_METHOD"; then
          echo "Auto-merge enabled successfully"
          echo "enabled=true" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        else
          echo "::warning::Failed to enable auto-merge. This may require branch protection rules to be configured."
          echo "enabled=false" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        fi

content.thinking: The `auto-merge-pr` action is just a thin wrapper around `gh pr merge --auto --squash`. The user's `update-flake-input` already does this inline. It's not really worth extracting into a separate action unless you're using it from multiple places. Let me check if ryoppippi uses it from multiple places.

content.text:
`auto-merge-pr` は `gh pr merge --auto --squash` の薄いラッパーです。自分の `update-flake-input` では既にインラインで同じことをしているので、これは取り込む必要なしです。

残りの差分で確認すべきものは、`_update-flake-reusable.yaml` と `auto-rebase.yaml` の更新後の状態です。最終確認します。

content.text:
残っている差分で意味があるのは以下のみです。

### `setup-git-bot`
- **input 名**: ryoppippi `private-key` vs 自分 `app-private-key`。機能は同じ。命名の好みの問題
- **SHA ピン**: ryoppippi `@bf559f85...` vs 自分 `@v3`。タグの方がメンテしやすい

### `auto-rebase.yaml`
- **`--force` vs `--force-with-lease`**: 自分の方が安全（他の push があった場合に拒否される）。ryoppippi は `--force`。ここは自分の方がベター
- **`set -euo pipefail`**: ryoppippi は冒頭で設定。エラー時に途中停止。取り込む価値あり
- **ログの詳細さ**: ryoppippi は PR 番号も表示。好みの範囲

**結論**: 既存ファイル間の残りの差分はスタイルの違いか、自分の方が良い部分（`--force-with-lease`）なので、機能的に取り込むべきものはもうありません。

diff --git a/.github/actions/setup-git-bot/action.yaml b/.github/actions/setup-git-bot/action.yaml
index 573827d..dc1943f 100644
--- a/.github/actions/setup-git-bot/action.yaml
+++ b/.github/actions/setup-git-bot/action.yaml
@@ -8,9 +8,6 @@ inputs:
   app-private-key:
     description: GitHub App private key
     required: true
-  app-slug:
-    description: GitHub App slug (URL末尾部分)
-    required: true
 
 outputs:
   token:
@@ -21,21 +18,16 @@ runs:
   using: composite
   steps:
     - id: token
-      uses: actions/create-github-app-token@v2
+      uses: actions/create-github-app-token@v3
       with:
         app-id: ${{ inputs.app-id }}
         private-key: ${{ inputs.app-private-key }}
 
-    - id: bot-identity
-      shell: bash
-      run: |
-        BOT_USER_ID=$(gh api "/users/${{ inputs.app-slug }}%5Bbot%5D" --jq '.id')
-        echo "name=${{ inputs.app-slug }}[bot]" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
-        echo "email=${BOT_USER_ID}+${{ inputs.app-slug }}[bot]@users.noreply.github.com" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
+    - shell: bash
       env:
         GH_TOKEN: ${{ steps.token.outputs.token }}
-
-    - shell: bash
+        APP_SLUG: ${{ steps.token.outputs.app-slug }}
       run: |
-        git config user.name "${{ steps.bot-identity.outputs.name }}"
-        git config user.email "${{ steps.bot-identity.outputs.email }}"
+        BOT_ID=$(gh api "users/${APP_SLUG}[bot]" --jq '.id')
+        git config user.name "${APP_SLUG}[bot]"
+        git config user.email "${BOT_ID}+${APP_SLUG}[bot]@users.noreply.github.com"
diff --git a/.github/actions/setup-nix/action.yaml b/.github/actions/setup-nix/action.yaml
index 3ecfbaf..dcc5d74 100644
--- a/.github/actions/setup-nix/action.yaml
+++ b/.github/actions/setup-nix/action.yaml
@@ -1,11 +1,23 @@
 name: Setup Nix
-description: Install Nix and configure numtide cache
+description: Install Nix and configure caches
+
+inputs:
+  cachix-auth-token:
+    description: Cachix authentication token for push
+    required: false
 
 runs:
   using: composite
   steps:
     - uses: cachix/install-nix-action@v31
+      with:
+        github_access_token: ${{ github.token }}
     - uses: cachix/cachix-action@v16
       with:
         name: numtide
         skipPush: true
+    - if: inputs.cachix-auth-token != ''
+      uses: cachix/cachix-action@v16
+      with:
+        name: yutakobayashidev
+        authToken: ${{ inputs.cachix-auth-token }}
diff --git a/.github/actions/update-flake-input/action.yaml b/.github/actions/update-flake-input/action.yaml
index e3229e4..14b3254 100644
--- a/.github/actions/update-flake-input/action.yaml
+++ b/.github/actions/update-flake-input/action.yaml
@@ -91,17 +91,31 @@ runs:
       run: |
         OLD_REV="${{ steps.current.outputs.rev }}"
         NEW_REV="${{ steps.updated.outputs.rev }}"
-        PACKAGES="claude-code ccusage codex opencode vibe-kanban"
+        PACKAGES="claude-code ccusage codex opencode vibe-kanban amp gemini-cli goose-cli"
 
         TABLE="| Package | Old | New |"
         TABLE="${TABLE}
         |---|---|---|"
 
+        PKG_DIFF=""
+
         for pkg in $PACKAGES; do
           OLD_VER=$(nix eval --raw "github:numtide/llm-agents.nix/${OLD_REV}#packages.x86_64-linux.${pkg}.version" 2>/dev/null || echo "N/A")
           NEW_VER=$(nix eval --raw "github:numtide/llm-agents.nix/${NEW_REV}#packages.x86_64-linux.${pkg}.version" 2>/dev/null || echo "N/A")
+
+          if [ "$OLD_VER" != "$NEW_VER" ] && [ "$NEW_VER" != "N/A" ]; then
+            MARKER=" :arrow_up:"
+            if [ -n "$PKG_DIFF" ]; then
+              PKG_DIFF="${PKG_DIFF}, ${pkg}=${NEW_VER}"
+            else
+              PKG_DIFF="${pkg}=${NEW_VER}"
+            fi
+          else
+            MARKER=""
+          fi
+
           TABLE="${TABLE}
-        | \`${pkg}\` | ${OLD_VER} | ${NEW_VER} |"
+        | \`${pkg}\` | ${OLD_VER} | ${NEW_VER}${MARKER} |"
         done
 
         {
@@ -110,6 +124,8 @@ runs:
           echo "VERSIONS_EOF"
         } >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
 
+        echo "pkg_diff=${PKG_DIFF}" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
+
     - name: Create or update PR
       if: steps.diff.outputs.changed == 'true'
       shell: bash
@@ -122,10 +138,18 @@ runs:
         SHORT_NEW="${NEW_REV:0:7}"
         COMPARE_URL="https://github.com/${{ inputs.owner }}/${{ inputs.repo }}/compare/${OLD_REV}...${NEW_REV}"
 
+        # Build PR title with version diff for llm-agents
+        PKG_DIFF="${{ steps.versions.outputs.pkg_diff }}"
+        if [ -n "$PKG_DIFF" ]; then
+          PR_TITLE="flake.lock: update ${INPUT} (${PKG_DIFF})"
+        else
+          PR_TITLE="flake.lock: update ${INPUT}"
+        fi
+
         # Commit and push
         git checkout -B "$BRANCH"
         git add flake.lock
-        git commit -m "flake.lock: update ${INPUT}"
+        git commit -m "$PR_TITLE"
         git push -f origin "$BRANCH"
 
         # Build PR body
@@ -147,13 +171,14 @@ runs:
 
         if [ -n "$EXISTING_PR" ] && [ "$EXISTING_PR" != "null" ]; then
           echo "Updating existing PR #${EXISTING_PR}"
-          gh pr edit "$EXISTING_PR" --body "$BODY"
+          gh pr edit "$EXISTING_PR" --title "$PR_TITLE" --body "$BODY"
         else
           echo "Creating new PR"
           gh pr create \
-            --title "flake.lock: update ${INPUT}" \
+            --title "$PR_TITLE" \
             --body "$BODY" \
-            --head "$BRANCH"
+            --head "$BRANCH" \
+            --label "dependencies,automated"
         fi
 
         # Enable auto-merge
diff --git a/.github/workflows/_update-flake-reusable.yaml b/.github/workflows/_update-flake-reusable.yaml
index d341e1e..43ff387 100644
--- a/.github/workflows/_update-flake-reusable.yaml
+++ b/.github/workflows/_update-flake-reusable.yaml
@@ -24,6 +24,8 @@ on:
         required: true
       FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_PRIVATE_KEY:
         required: true
+      CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN:
+        required: false
 
 jobs:
   discover:
@@ -55,13 +57,14 @@ jobs:
         with:
           app-id: ${{ secrets.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_ID }}
           app-private-key: ${{ secrets.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_PRIVATE_KEY }}
-          app-slug: ${{ vars.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_SLUG }}
 
       - uses: actions/checkout@v4
         with:
           token: ${{ steps.setup-bot.outputs.token }}
 
       - uses: ./.github/actions/setup-nix
+        with:
+          cachix-auth-token: ${{ secrets.CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN }}
 
       - uses: ./.github/actions/update-flake-input
         with:
diff --git a/.github/workflows/update-flake-frequent.yaml b/.github/workflows/update-flake-frequent.yaml
index 1c0ca40..51d1ac7 100644
--- a/.github/workflows/update-flake-frequent.yaml
+++ b/.github/workflows/update-flake-frequent.yaml
@@ -15,3 +15,4 @@ jobs:
     secrets:
       FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_ID: ${{ secrets.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_ID }}
       FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_PRIVATE_KEY: ${{ secrets.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_PRIVATE_KEY }}
+      CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN }}
diff --git a/.github/workflows/update-flake.yaml b/.github/workflows/update-flake.yaml
index 8003496..f787e92 100644
--- a/.github/workflows/update-flake.yaml
+++ b/.github/workflows/update-flake.yaml
@@ -4,13 +4,26 @@ on:
   schedule:
     - cron: "0 6 * * *"
   workflow_dispatch:
+    inputs:
+      minimum-release-age-days:
+        description: "Minimum release age in days before updating"
+        required: false
+        type: number
+        default: 3
+      skip-delay:
+        description: "Skip the minimum release age check for all inputs"
+        required: false
+        type: boolean
+        default: false
 
 jobs:
   update:
     uses: ./.github/workflows/_update-flake-reusable.yaml
     with:
       exclude-inputs: "llm-agents"
-      minimum-release-age-days: 3
+      minimum-release-age-days: ${{ github.event.inputs.minimum-release-age-days && fromJSON(github.event.inputs.minimum-release-age-days) || 3 }}
+      skip-delay: ${{ github.event.inputs.skip-delay == 'true' }}
     secrets:
       FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_ID: ${{ secrets.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_ID }}
       FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_PRIVATE_KEY: ${{ secrets.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_PRIVATE_KEY }}
+      CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN }}

content.content: Switched to a new branch 'feat/improve-nix-updater'

toolUseResult.stdout: Switched to a new branch 'feat/improve-nix-updater'

input.command:
git add .github/actions/setup-git-bot/action.yaml .github/actions/setup-nix/action.yaml .github/actions/update-flake-input/action.yaml .github/workflows/_update-flake-reusable.yaml .github/workflows/update-flake.yaml .github/workflows/update-flake-frequent.yaml .github/workflows/auto-rebase.yaml .github/workflows/nix-build.yaml && git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
feat: improve nix updater CI

- Add nix-build workflow for NixOS config build verification on PR/push
- Add auto-rebase workflow to keep update-flake PRs up to date with main
- Upgrade setup-git-bot to create-github-app-token v3 (auto app-slug)
- Add Cachix write support (yutakobayashidev cache) to setup-nix
- Add github_access_token to avoid GitHub API rate limits in CI
- Add version diff to PR titles for llm-agents updates
- Add more packages to version check (amp, gemini-cli, goose-cli)
- Add PR labels (dependencies, automated) for flake update PRs
- Add workflow_dispatch parameters to stable update workflow
- Pass CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN through all update workflows

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"
input.description: 全変更をコミット

     5→export PATH="${AQUA_ROOT_DIR}/bin:${PATH}"

file.content:
use flake

# aqua設定
export AQUA_ROOT_DIR="${HOME}/.local/share/aquaproj-aqua"
export PATH="${AQUA_ROOT_DIR}/bin:${PATH}"

# aquaがインストール済みなら自動実行
if command -v aqua &> /dev/null; then
  aqua install -a
fi

Now I understand the setup. `pinact` is a tool by suzuki-shunsuke that pins GitHub Actions to specific commit SHAs. The recogra project uses:

1. `aqua.yaml` to install `pinact` (suzuki-shunsuke/pinact@v3.4.2)
2. `.pinact.yml` for pinact config (version 3)
3. `pinact-action` in CI to verify actions are pinned

For the dotnix project, the user wants to add pinact to pin GitHub Actions to SHA hashes. This project doesn't use aqua, so I need to figure out the best way to install pinact.


Since dotnix uses Nix, I should check if pinact is available in nixpkgs or through an overlay, or consider using aqua if the project already has an aqua overlay available.

file.content:
name: Setup Git Bot
description: Generate GitHub App token and configure git identity

inputs:
  app-id:
    description: GitHub App ID
    required: true
  app-private-key:
    description: GitHub App private key
    required: true

outputs:
  token:
    description: GitHub App installation token
    value: ${{ steps.token.outputs.token }}

runs:
  using: composite
  steps:
    - id: token
      uses: actions/create-github-app-token@v3
      with:
        app-id: ${{ inputs.app-id }}
        private-key: ${{ inputs.app-private-key }}

    - shell: bash
      env:
        GH_TOKEN: ${{ steps.token.outputs.token }}
        APP_SLUG: ${{ steps.token.outputs.app-slug }}
      run: |
        BOT_ID=$(gh api "users/${APP_SLUG}[bot]" --jq '.id')
        git config user.name "${APP_SLUG}[bot]"
        git config user.email "${BOT_ID}+${APP_SLUG}[bot]@users.noreply.github.com"

toolUseResult.originalFile:
name: Setup Git Bot
description: Generate GitHub App token and configure git identity

inputs:
  app-id:
    description: GitHub App ID
    required: true
  app-private-key:
    description: GitHub App private key
    required: true

outputs:
  token:
    description: GitHub App installation token
    value: ${{ steps.token.outputs.token }}

runs:
  using: composite
  steps:
    - id: token
      uses: actions/create-github-app-token@v3
      with:
        app-id: ${{ inputs.app-id }}
        private-key: ${{ inputs.app-private-key }}

    - shell: bash
      env:
        GH_TOKEN: ${{ steps.token.outputs.token }}
        APP_SLUG: ${{ steps.token.outputs.app-slug }}
      run: |
        BOT_ID=$(gh api "users/${APP_SLUG}[bot]" --jq '.id')
        git config user.name "${APP_SLUG}[bot]"
        git config user.email "${BOT_ID}+${APP_SLUG}[bot]@users.noreply.github.com"

## Summary

- nix-build CI ワークフロー追加（PR/push で NixOS config のビルド検証）
- auto-rebase ワークフロー追加（main push 時に update-flake PR を自動 rebase）
- setup-git-bot を `create-github-app-token` v3 に移行（app-slug 自動取得）
- Cachix 書き込み対応（`yutakobayashidev` キャッシュ + `github_access_token` でレート制限回避）
- PR タイトルにバージョン差分表示（llm-agents 更新時）
- バージョンチェック対象に amp, gemini-cli, goose-cli を追加
- PR ラベル `dependencies,automated` 自動付与
- `update-flake.yaml` の workflow_dispatch パラメータ化
- pinact で全 GitHub Actions を SHA ハッシュにピン

## Test plan

- [ ] `nix-build.yaml` が nix 関連ファイル変更の PR で発火するか確認
- [ ] `auto-rebase.yaml` を workflow_dispatch で手動実行して動作確認
- [ ] Cachix キャッシュ `yutakobayashidev` の作成と `CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN` シークレット追加
- [ ] `dependencies` / `automated` ラベルをリポジトリに作成
- [ ] `FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_SLUG` vars は削除可能

🤖 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)
EOF
)"

toolUseResult.oldString: PACKAGES="claude-code ccusage codex opencode vibe-kanban amp gemini-cli goose-cli"
toolUseResult.originalFile:
name: Update Flake Input
description: Update a single flake input, create PR, and enable auto-merge

inputs:
  input:
    description: Flake input name
    required: true
  owner:
    description: GitHub repository owner
    required: true
  repo:
    description: GitHub repository name
    required: true
  token:
    description: GitHub token for PR operations
    required: true
  skip-delay:
    description: Skip random delay
    default: "false"
  minimum-release-age-days:
    description: Minimum age in days for the release commit
    default: "0"

runs:
  using: composite
  steps:
    - name: Random delay
      if: inputs.skip-delay != 'true'
      shell: bash
      run: |
        DELAY=$((RANDOM % 60))
        echo "Sleeping ${DELAY}s to avoid rate limits"
        sleep "$DELAY"

    - name: Get current revision
      id: current
      shell: bash
      run: |
        NODE=$(jq -r '.nodes.root.inputs["${{ inputs.input }}"]' flake.lock)
        REV=$(jq -r ".nodes[\"${NODE}\"].locked.rev" flake.lock)
        echo "node=${NODE}" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        echo "rev=${REV}" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"

    - name: Update flake input
      shell: bash
      run: nix flake update "${{ inputs.input }}"

    - name: Get updated revision
      id: updated
      shell: bash
      run: |
        NODE="${{ steps.current.outputs.node }}"
        REV=$(jq -r ".nodes[\"${NODE}\"].locked.rev" flake.lock)
        echo "rev=${REV}" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"

    - name: Check release age
      if: inputs.minimum-release-age-days != '0' && steps.current.outputs.rev != steps.updated.outputs.rev
      id: age-check
      shell: bash
      run: |
        COMMIT_DATE=$(gh api "repos/${{ inputs.owner }}/${{ inputs.repo }}/commits/${{ steps.updated.outputs.rev }}" --jq '.commit.committer.date')
        COMMIT_TS=$(date -d "$COMMIT_DATE" +%s)
        THRESHOLD_TS=$(date -d "${{ inputs.minimum-release-age-days }} days ago" +%s)

        if [ "$COMMIT_TS" -gt "$THRESHOLD_TS" ]; then
          echo "Commit ${{ steps.updated.outputs.rev }} is less than ${{ inputs.minimum-release-age-days }} days old, skipping"
          git checkout -- flake.lock
          echo "skip=true" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        else
          echo "skip=false" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        fi
      env:
        GH_TOKEN: ${{ inputs.token }}

    - name: Check for changes
      id: diff
      if: steps.age-check.outputs.skip != 'true'
      shell: bash
      run: |
        if git diff --quiet flake.lock; then
          echo "No changes for ${{ inputs.input }}"
          echo "changed=false" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        else
          echo "changed=true" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"
        fi

    - name: Get llm-agents package versions
      if: inputs.input == 'llm-agents' && steps.diff.outputs.changed == 'true'
      id: versions
      shell: bash
      run: |
        OLD_REV="${{ steps.current.outputs.rev }}"
        NEW_REV="${{ steps.updated.outputs.rev }}"
        PACKAGES="claude-code ccusage codex opencode vibe-kanban amp gemini-cli goose-cli"

        TABLE="| Package | Old | New |"
        TABLE="${TABLE}
        |---|---|---|"

        PKG_DIFF=""

        for pkg in $PACKAGES; do
          OLD_VER=$(nix eval --raw "github:numtide/llm-agents.nix/${OLD_REV}#packages.x86_64-linux.${pkg}.version" 2>/dev/null || echo "N/A")
          NEW_VER=$(nix eval --raw "github:numtide/llm-agents.nix/${NEW_REV}#packages.x86_64-linux.${pkg}.version" 2>/dev/null || echo "N/A")

          if [ "$OLD_VER" != "$NEW_VER" ] && [ "$NEW_VER" != "N/A" ]; then
            MARKER=" :arrow_up:"
            if [ -n "$PKG_DIFF" ]; then
              PKG_DIFF="${PKG_DIFF}, ${pkg}=${NEW_VER}"
            else
              PKG_DIFF="${pkg}=${NEW_VER}"
            fi
          else
            MARKER=""
          fi

          TABLE="${TABLE}
        | \`${pkg}\` | ${OLD_VER} | ${NEW_VER}${MARKER} |"
        done

        {
          echo "table<<VERSIONS_EOF"
          echo "$TABLE"
          echo "VERSIONS_EOF"
        } >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"

        echo "pkg_diff=${PKG_DIFF}" >> "$GITHUB_OUTPUT"

    - name: Create or update PR
      if: steps.diff.outputs.changed == 'true'
      shell: bash
      run: |
        INPUT="${{ inputs.input }}"
        BRANCH="update-flake-${INPUT}"
        OLD_REV="${{ steps.current.outputs.rev }}"
        NEW_REV="${{ steps.updated.outputs.rev }}"
        SHORT_OLD="${OLD_REV:0:7}"
        SHORT_NEW="${NEW_REV:0:7}"
        COMPARE_URL="https://github.com/${{ inputs.owner }}/${{ inputs.repo }}/compare/${OLD_REV}...${NEW_REV}"

        # Build PR title with version diff for llm-agents
        PKG_DIFF="${{ steps.versions.outputs.pkg_diff }}"
        if [ -n "$PKG_DIFF" ]; then
          PR_TITLE="flake.lock: update ${INPUT} (${PKG_DIFF})"
        else
          PR_TITLE="flake.lock: update ${INPUT}"
        fi

        # Commit and push
        git checkout -B "$BRANCH"
        git add flake.lock
        git commit -m "$PR_TITLE"
        git push -f origin "$BRANCH"

        # Build PR body
        BODY="Update \`${INPUT}\` input.

        **Diff**: [\`${SHORT_OLD}...${SHORT_NEW}\`](${COMPARE_URL})"

        VERSION_TABLE="${{ steps.versions.outputs.table }}"
        if [ -n "$VERSION_TABLE" ]; then
          BODY="${BODY}

        ## Package Versions

        ${VERSION_TABLE}"
        fi

        # Create or update PR
        EXISTING_PR=$(gh pr list --head "$BRANCH" --state open --json number --jq '.[0].number' 2>/dev/null || true)

        if [ -n "$EXISTING_PR" ] && [ "$EXISTING_PR" != "null" ]; then
          echo "Updating existing PR #${EXISTING_PR}"
          gh pr edit "$EXISTING_PR" --title "$PR_TITLE" --body "$BODY"
        else
          echo "Creating new PR"
          gh pr create \
            --title "$PR_TITLE" \
            --body "$BODY" \
            --head "$BRANCH" \
            --label "dependencies,automated"
        fi

        # Enable auto-merge
        PR_NUMBER=$(gh pr list --head "$BRANCH" --state open --json number --jq '.[0].number')
        if [ -n "$PR_NUMBER" ] && [ "$PR_NUMBER" != "null" ]; then
          gh pr merge "$PR_NUMBER" --auto --squash
        fi
      env:
        GH_TOKEN: ${{ inputs.token }}

lines: -        PACKAGES="claude-code ccusage codex opencode vibe-kanban amp gemini-cli goose-cli"

toolUseResult.originalFile:
name: Update Flake Inputs (Reusable)

on:
  workflow_call:
    inputs:
      exclude-inputs:
        description: Comma-separated list of inputs to exclude
        type: string
        default: ""
      include-inputs:
        description: Comma-separated list of inputs to include (if set, only these)
        type: string
        default: ""
      skip-delay:
        description: Skip random delay between updates
        type: boolean
        default: false
      minimum-release-age-days:
        description: Minimum age in days for the release commit
        type: number
        default: 0
    secrets:
      FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_ID:
        required: true
      FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_PRIVATE_KEY:
        required: true
      CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN:
        required: false

jobs:
  discover:
    runs-on: ubuntu-24.04-arm
    outputs:
      matrix: ${{ steps.discover.outputs.matrix }}
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@34e114876b0b11c390a56381ad16ebd13914f8d5 # v4.3.1
      - uses: ./.github/actions/setup-nix
      - id: discover
        uses: ./.github/actions/discover-flake-inputs
        with:
          exclude-inputs: ${{ inputs.exclude-inputs }}
          include-inputs: ${{ inputs.include-inputs }}
          skip-delay: ${{ inputs.skip-delay }}

  update:
    needs: discover
    if: ${{ fromJSON(needs.discover.outputs.matrix).include[0] != null }}
    runs-on: ubuntu-24.04-arm
    strategy:
      fail-fast: false
      matrix: ${{ fromJSON(needs.discover.outputs.matrix) }}
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@34e114876b0b11c390a56381ad16ebd13914f8d5 # v4.3.1

      - id: setup-bot
        uses: ./.github/actions/setup-git-bot
        with:
          app-id: ${{ secrets.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_ID }}
          app-private-key: ${{ secrets.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_PRIVATE_KEY }}

      - uses: actions/checkout@34e114876b0b11c390a56381ad16ebd13914f8d5 # v4.3.1
        with:
          token: ${{ steps.setup-bot.outputs.token }}

      - uses: ./.github/actions/setup-nix
        with:
          cachix-auth-token: ${{ secrets.CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN }}

      - uses: ./.github/actions/update-flake-input
        with:
          input: ${{ matrix.input }}
          owner: ${{ matrix.owner }}
          repo: ${{ matrix.repo }}
          token: ${{ steps.setup-bot.outputs.token }}
          skip-delay: ${{ matrix.skip_delay }}
          minimum-release-age-days: ${{ inputs.minimum-release-age-days }}

  summary:
    needs: [discover, update]
    if: always()
    runs-on: ubuntu-24.04-arm
    steps:
      - run: |
          echo "## Update Summary" >> "$GITHUB_STEP_SUMMARY"
          echo "- Discover: ${{ needs.discover.result }}" >> "$GITHUB_STEP_SUMMARY"
          echo "- Update: ${{ needs.update.result }}" >> "$GITHUB_STEP_SUMMARY"

toolUseResult.originalFile:
name: "CI: Nix build"

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  pull_request:
  workflow_dispatch:

concurrency:
  group: ${{ github.workflow }}-${{ github.ref }}
  cancel-in-progress: true

jobs:
  changes:
    runs-on: ubuntu-24.04-arm
    outputs:
      nix: ${{ steps.filter.outputs.nix }}
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@34e114876b0b11c390a56381ad16ebd13914f8d5 # v4.3.1
      - uses: dorny/paths-filter@de90cc6fb38fc0963ad72b210f1f284cd68cea36 # v3.0.2
        id: filter
        with:
          filters: |
            nix:
              - 'flake.nix'
              - 'flake.lock'
              - 'nix/**'
              - '.github/workflows/nix-build.yaml'
              - '.github/actions/setup-nix/**'

  build:
    needs: changes
    if: needs.changes.outputs.nix == 'true' || github.event_name == 'workflow_dispatch'
    runs-on: ubuntu-24.04-arm
    timeout-minutes: 30
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@34e114876b0b11c390a56381ad16ebd13914f8d5 # v4.3.1
      - uses: ./.github/actions/setup-nix
        with:
          cachix-auth-token: ${{ secrets.CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN }}
      - name: Build NixOS configuration
        run: |
          nix build .#nixosConfigurations.nixos.config.system.build.toplevel \
            --print-build-logs \
            --show-trace

toolUseResult.originalFile:
name: "Auto-rebase update PRs"

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  workflow_dispatch:

concurrency:
  group: auto-rebase
  cancel-in-progress: false

jobs:
  rebase-prs:
    runs-on: ubuntu-24.04-arm
    if: github.event_name == 'workflow_dispatch' || github.event.head_commit.committer.name == 'GitHub'
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@34e114876b0b11c390a56381ad16ebd13914f8d5 # v4.3.1

      - id: setup-bot
        uses: ./.github/actions/setup-git-bot
        with:
          app-id: ${{ secrets.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_ID }}
          app-private-key: ${{ secrets.FLAKE_UPDATER_APP_PRIVATE_KEY }}

      - uses: actions/checkout@34e114876b0b11c390a56381ad16ebd13914f8d5 # v4.3.1
        with:
          token: ${{ steps.setup-bot.outputs.token }}
          fetch-depth: 0

      - name: Rebase open flake update PRs
        shell: bash
        run: |
          BRANCHES=$(gh pr list --state open --json headRefName --jq '.[].headRefName | select(startswith("update-flake-"))')

          if [ -z "$BRANCHES" ]; then
            echo "No update-flake PRs found"
            exit 0
          fi

          for BRANCH in $BRANCHES; do
            echo "--- Processing $BRANCH ---"
            git fetch origin "$BRANCH"

            BEHIND=$(git rev-list --count "origin/$BRANCH..origin/main")
            if [ "$BEHIND" -eq 0 ]; then
              echo "$BRANCH is up to date"
              continue
            fi

            echo "$BRANCH is $BEHIND commits behind main, rebasing..."
            git checkout "$BRANCH"

            if git rebase origin/main; then
              git push --force-with-lease origin "$BRANCH"
              echo "$BRANCH rebased successfully"
            else
              echo "$BRANCH rebase failed, aborting"
              git rebase --abort
            fi

            git checkout main
          done
        env:
          GH_TOKEN: ${{ steps.setup-bot.outputs.token }}

name: Setup Nix
description: Install Nix and configure caches

inputs:
  cachix-auth-token:
    description: Cachix authentication token for push
    required: false

runs:
  using: composite
  steps:
    - uses: cachix/install-nix-action@4e002c8ec80594ecd40e759629461e26c8abed15 # v31.9.0
      with:
        github_access_token: ${{ github.token }}
    - uses: cachix/cachix-action@3ba601ff5bbb07c7220846facfa2cd81eeee15a1 # v16
      with:
        name: numtide
        skipPush: true
    - if: inputs.cachix-auth-token != ''
      uses: cachix/cachix-action@3ba601ff5bbb07c7220846facfa2cd81eeee15a1 # v16
      with:
        name: yutakobayashidev
        authToken: ${{ inputs.cachix-auth-token }}

content.text: `yutakobayashidev` という名前の Cachix キャッシュがまだ作成されていないため失敗しています。2つの対応方法があります。

questions.question: Cachix キャッシュをどうしますか？

options.label: キャッシュを作成する
options.description: cachix.org でキャッシュを作成して CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN シークレットを追加する。その後 CI が通る

options.label: Cachix push を一旦無効化
options.description: キャッシュ作成するまで、CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN が未設定なら Cachix push をスキップするよう修正

answers.Cachix キャッシュをどうしますか？: キャッシュを作成する

content.text:
Cachix キャッシュの作成手順です:

```bash
# 1. Cachix にログイン（GitHub OAuth）
cachix authtoken <your-token>  # https://app.cachix.org/personal-auth-tokens で生成

# 2. キャッシュ作成
cachix create yutakobayashidev

# 3. GitHub リポジトリに CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN シークレットを追加
gh secret set CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN
```

`cachix` コマンドが手元にない場合は `nix shell nixpkgs#cachix` で使えます。作成できたら CI を再実行すれば通るはずです。

name: Setup Nix
description: Install Nix and configure caches

inputs:
  cachix-auth-token:
    description: Cachix authentication token for push
    required: false

runs:
  using: composite
  steps:
    - uses: cachix/install-nix-action@2126ae7fc54c9df00dd18f7f18754393182c73cd # v31.9.1
      with:
        github_access_token: ${{ github.token }}
    - uses: cachix/cachix-action@3ba601ff5bbb07c7220846facfa2cd81eeee15a1 # v16
      with:
        name: numtide
        skipPush: true
    - if: inputs.cachix-auth-token != ''
      uses: cachix/cachix-action@3ba601ff5bbb07c7220846facfa2cd81eeee15a1 # v16
      with:
        name: yutakobayashidev
        authToken: ${{ inputs.cachix-auth-token }}

message.content: actionsとローカルでの基本的なワークフローを教えて

content.thinking: The user wants to understand the overall workflow of how the nix updater works, both in GitHub Actions and locally. Let me explain the flow clearly.

content.text:
## GitHub Actions（自動）

```
┌─ update-flake.yaml (毎日 6:00 UTC) ─────────────────────────┐
│  対象: llm-agents 以外の全 flake inputs                       │
│  条件: リリースから3日以上経過したもののみ                      │
│                                                               │
│  1. discover: flake.lock から更新対象を検出                    │
│  2. update:   入力ごとに並列で                                │
│     - nix flake update <input>                                │
│     - ブランチ update-flake-<input> を作成                    │
│     - PR 作成 → auto-merge 有効化                             │
│  3. Cachix push: ビルド成果物を yuta キャッシュに保存          │
└───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘

┌─ update-flake-frequent.yaml (3時間ごと) ─────────────────────┐
│  対象: llm-agents のみ（claude-code 等を常に最新に）          │
│  条件: リリース年齢チェックなし                                │
│  PR タイトル例: flake.lock: update llm-agents (claude-code=2.1.50) │
└───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘

┌─ auto-rebase.yaml (main に push 時) ────────────────────────┐
│  update-flake-* の open PR を main に自動 rebase              │
│  → コンフリクト防止 + CI 再実行                               │
└───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘

┌─ nix-build.yaml (PR / main push 時) ────────────────────────┐
│  nix 関連ファイル変更時に NixOS config をビルド検証            │
│  → ビルド成果物を Cachix にキャッシュ                         │
└───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘

┌─ pinact.yaml (PR 時) ───────────────────────────────────────┐
│  actions が SHA ピンされているかチェック                       │
└───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
```

## 全体の流れ

```
update-flake / update-flake-frequent
  │
  ▼
PR 作成 (update-flake-<input>) + auto-merge 有効化
  │
  ├─► nix-build.yaml が発火 → ビルド検証 + Cachix push
  ├─► pinact.yaml が発火 → SHA ピンチェック
  │
  ▼ (CI パス)
auto-merge で main にマージ
  │
  ▼
auto-rebase.yaml が発火 → 残りの update PR を rebase
```

## ローカル

```bash
# 日常: main を pull して switch
git pull
nix run .#switch              # (= rebuild エイリアス)

# 手動で flake 更新したいとき
nix flake update              # 全 inputs を更新
nix flake update nixpkgs      # 特定の input のみ
nix run .#switch              # 適用

# Cachix にローカルビルドを push（CI を高速化）
nix build .#nixosConfigurations.nixos.config.system.build.toplevel
cachix push yuta ./result

# actions の SHA ピンを更新
nix shell nixpkgs#pinact -c pinact run
```

今後 **Git hooks (Home Manager)** を入れると、`git pull` 後に nix ファイルの変更を検知して自動で `nix run .#switch` が走るようになります。

message.content: pullすると気もキャッシュを使ったほうがいいのでは？

content.text:
確かに。pull 時に Cachix から引くようにすれば、CI で既にビルド済みのものをローカルで再ビルドせずに済みます。

現状の `nix.conf` を確認します。

content.content:
1→substituters = https://cache.nixos.org https://cache.nixos.org/ https://yuta.cachix.org
     2→trusted-public-keys = cache.nixos.org-1:REDACTED yuta.cachix.org-1:REDACTED
     3→

file.content:
substituters = https://cache.nixos.org https://cache.nixos.org/ https://yuta.cachix.org
trusted-public-keys = cache.nixos.org-1:REDACTED yuta.cachix.org-1:REDACTED

content.text:
ローカルの `nix.conf` には既に `yuta.cachix.org` が substituter として設定されています（先ほど `cachix use yuta` で追加された）。

ただしこれは NixOS の `configuration.nix` / flake で管理した方が良いです。`nix.conf` は手動管理になり、再インストール時に消えます。

content.content: No matches found

content.text:
NixOS・macOS どちらも `nix.settings` に substituters が未設定です。flake.nix の `nixConfig` にはあるものの、あれはビルド時のヒントで、`nix run .#switch` 等のシステム設定には反映されません。

Cachix の substituter を NixOS / macOS 両方のシステム設定に追加します。

content.content: The file /home/yuta/ghq/github.com/yutakobayashidev/dotnix/nix/hosts/nixos/default.nix has been updated successfully.
The file /home/yuta/ghq/github.com/yutakobayashidev/dotnix/nix/modules/darwin/system.nix has been updated successfully.

content.text:
これで NixOS / macOS ともにシステムレベルで3つの substituter を参照します:

- **cache.nixos.org** - 公式キャッシュ
- **cache.numtide.com** - llm-agents 等のキャッシュ
- **yuta.cachix.org** - 自分のビルド成果物（CI で push されたもの）

`nix run .#switch` を実行すれば反映されます。手動で追加した `~/.config/nix/nix.conf` は反映後に削除して構いません。

content.text:
原因が分かりました。

**`ubuntu-24.04-arm` ランナーは `aarch64-linux`** ですが、**NixOS config は `x86_64-linux`** 用です。`moonbit-overlay` が `Cargo.lock` を読み込むために IFD (Import From Derivation) でソースを取得しようとするとき、`x86_64-linux` のビルドが必要になりますが、`aarch64-linux` ランナーでは実行できません。

対処法は runner を `ubuntu-24.04` (x86_64) に変更することです。

file.content:
name: "CI: Nix build"

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  pull_request:
  workflow_dispatch:

concurrency:
  group: ${{ github.workflow }}-${{ github.ref }}
  cancel-in-progress: true

jobs:
  changes:
    runs-on: ubuntu-24.04-arm
    outputs:
      nix: ${{ steps.filter.outputs.nix }}
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@de0fac2e4500dabe0009e67214ff5f5447ce83dd # v6.0.2
      - uses: dorny/paths-filter@de90cc6fb38fc0963ad72b210f1f284cd68cea36 # v3.0.2
        id: filter
        with:
          filters: |
            nix:
              - 'flake.nix'
              - 'flake.lock'
              - 'nix/**'
              - '.github/workflows/nix-build.yaml'
              - '.github/actions/setup-nix/**'

  build:
    needs: changes
    if: needs.changes.outputs.nix == 'true' || github.event_name == 'workflow_dispatch'
    runs-on: ubuntu-24.04-arm
    timeout-minutes: 30
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@de0fac2e4500dabe0009e67214ff5f5447ce83dd # v6.0.2
      - uses: ./.github/actions/setup-nix
        with:
          cachix-auth-token: ${{ secrets.CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN }}
      - name: Build NixOS configuration
        run: |
          nix build .#nixosConfigurations.nixos.config.system.build.toplevel \
            --print-build-logs \
            --show-trace

content.text: `build` ジョブの runner を `ubuntu-24.04` (x86_64) に変更します。`changes` ジョブは軽量なので arm のままで問題ありません。

name: "CI: Nix build"

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  pull_request:
  workflow_dispatch:

concurrency:
  group: ${{ github.workflow }}-${{ github.ref }}
  cancel-in-progress: true

jobs:
  changes:
    runs-on: ubuntu-24.04-arm
    outputs:
      nix: ${{ steps.filter.outputs.nix }}
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@de0fac2e4500dabe0009e67214ff5f5447ce83dd # v6.0.2
      - uses: dorny/paths-filter@de90cc6fb38fc0963ad72b210f1f284cd68cea36 # v3.0.2
        id: filter
        with:
          filters: |
            nix:
              - 'flake.nix'
              - 'flake.lock'
              - 'nix/**'
              - '.github/workflows/nix-build.yaml'
              - '.github/actions/setup-nix/**'

  build:
    needs: changes
    if: needs.changes.outputs.nix == 'true' || github.event_name == 'workflow_dispatch'
    runs-on: ubuntu-24.04-arm
    timeout-minutes: 30
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@de0fac2e4500dabe0009e67214ff5f5447ce83dd # v6.0.2
      - uses: ./.github/actions/setup-nix
        with:
          cachix-auth-token: ${{ secrets.CACHIX_AUTH_TOKEN }}
      - name: Build NixOS configuration
        run: |
          nix build .#nixosConfigurations.nixos.config.system.build.toplevel \
            --print-build-logs \
            --show-trace

content.text:
原因: **`ubuntu-24.04-arm` は `aarch64-linux`** だが、NixOS config (`x86_64-linux`) のビルドで `moonbit-overlay` が IFD を使い、`x86_64-linux` のデリベーションが必要になった。

修正: build ジョブの runner を `ubuntu-24.04` (x86_64) に変更。

content.text:
push しました。次の CI で x86_64 ランナーで実行されます。

---

`nixConfig` と `nix.settings` の違いについて:

**`nixConfig`**（flake.nix 内）:
- `nix build` や `nix flake update` など、**flake を評価するときだけ**有効
- 初回利用時にユーザーに確認ダイアログが出る（`accept-flake-config = true` で回避）
- flake を clone した誰でも恩恵を受けられる

**`nix.settings`**（NixOS / nix-darwin 設定）:
- **システム全体**の `/etc/nix/nix.conf` に書き込まれる
- `nixos-rebuild switch` や `nix-env` など**全ての Nix 操作**で有効
- そのマシン専用

**結論**: 両方設定するのがベスト。現状の構成で正しいです。

- `flake.nix` の `nixConfig` → CI や他の人が flake を使うとき用（numtide キャッシュ）
- `nix.settings` → ローカルマシンの全操作用（numtide + yuta キャッシュ）
